Uses of Interface
net.proteusframework.core.mail.MailPart

  • Packages that use MailPart 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.core.mail
    The com.i2rd.java.mail package provides classes that let the developer generate and send mail messages easily.

    • Uses of MailPart in net.proteusframework.core.mail
